TEXT.TITLE: PUERTO RICAN CEMENT CO <PRN> SETS PAYOUT
TEXT.BODY: Qtly div five cts vs five cts prior Pay May 13 Record April 14 NOTE: Company said up to 20 pct of dividend payment may be withheld in accordance with Puerto Rico tax law. Reuter
